title: List of all Androidzbar   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidzbar   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: ZBarScanner
repoList.description: This is an Android library project that simplifies the usage of the ZBar SDK for scanning bar codes from within your Android application.

repoList.name: ZBarFragment
repoList.description: Android Library to use ZBar Barcode Scanner in a Fragment

repoList.name: zbar-ane
repoList.description: Barcode/QR code reader AIR native extension for iOS+Android, that uses the ZBar library.

repoList.name: Acktie-Zbar-Android
repoList.description: A wrapper of the zBar library with some enhancements

repoList.name: Simple-Scanner-Android
repoList.description: This is easy to use scanner library support many types of bar codes based on fragments api and zbar library

repoList.name: AndroidQrCodeScanner
repoList.description: Scan QRcode using ZBar library

repoList.name: barcode-scanner
repoList.description: Android Barcode Scanner with Zbar library.

repoList.name: qrcode
repoList.description: A fast super 2D code recognition library from Android,combined with zxing and ZBar, and the speed is super fast.

repoList.name: Barcode-Scanner
repoList.description: A Kivy Application and its equivalent Android app that uses ZBar library to perform QR code and barcode detection

repoList.name: barcodes
repoList.description: Android app to read barcodes using Google Mobile Vision API, ZBar and ZXing libraries
